page.title: 16BROADLANDS ESTATE 2
page.content: Broadlands has some deciduous and conifer trees in its estate. You can walk through Nightingale Wood as long as you stick to the public foot paths as some of the areas are private. The private areas are used for pheasant shooting. In Ashfield there are a few cottages such as the malthouse cottages, the poplar cottages, the thatched cottages,Ashfield lodge and a couple more which are the farmhouses. There is even malthouse cottages owned by Mr and Mrs Thick who live there. Broadlands was opened to the public in 1979. Broadlands has lots of statues and many beautiful river side lawns with swans upon them.In the bed rooms there are four poster beds which are very beautiful.Every year Lord Romsey holds the Romsey show on Broadslands estate.
